name: Change Run
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for Mix And Game Jam.

To Make The Game I Used Processing, Magenta, And Audacity

How To Play:

The Button Above The Player Is To Jump

The Button Below Is To Fall Quickly

You Must Dodge All Of The Rocks and Birds (Squares) Coming At You, If You Hit One You Lose.

You Must Also Shoot The Target Before The Target Timer Runs Out (You Don't Need To Click To Shoot It Just Get Your Cursor To The Location).
